full_summary:
National Capital Commission (NCC) RFSO for Professional Services in Smart Building Technologies
======================================

**Procurement Details**
------------------------

*   **Reference Number**: cb-5315-20866840
*   **Amendment Number**: 7
*   **Solicitation Number**: MA063
*   **Publication Date**: 2023-05-08
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-07-20T15:00:00
*   **Amendment Date**: 2023-07-20
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-08-03
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: 2029-07-03

**Description**
----------------

The National Capital Commission (NCC) invites contractors to submit a Response to a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for professional services in smart building technologies on an "as and when requested" basis under a Standing Offer Agreement (SOA). The SOA will have a maximum of three (3) contractors who will be tasked to provide services at various locations within the National Capital Region.

**Tender Submission**
----------------------

Bidding entities may submit their tender by mailing it to the Contact Information provided below.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

*   **Contact Name**: Micheline Al-Koutsi
*   **Contact Email**: [micheline.al-koutsi@ncc-ccn.ca](mailto:micheline.al-koutsi@ncc-ccn.ca)
*   **Contact Phone**: (343) 552-5974
*   **Contact Address**: 202-40 Elgin Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1P 1C7, Canada

**Tendering Method**
---------------------

The procurement process is open for all qualified bidders and the officials will use a Competitive Bidding procedure.

**Tender Evaluation**
---------------------

The bids will be evaluated based on various criteria set out in the tender package. Business entities must ensure that they meet the requirements and submit their bids on time.

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

The National Capital Commission has negotiated various trade agreements with other countries, which are listed in the tender package.
